author: wn.com
title: Promising USC study focuses on treatment for dry eyes (USC - University of Southern California) ...
text: ( Source : USC - University of Southern California ) New research by the Fini Lab at Keck Medicine of USC demonstrates for the first time that a natural protein in tears may be key to treating dry eye syndrome, a common affliction of the eye
